template.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP
template.description:
ZYXEL MES3500-24S
MIBs used: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB IF-MIB RFC1213-MIB HOST-RESOURCES-MIB ZYXEL-HW-MONITOR-MIB ZYXEL-PORT-MIB ZYXEL-ES-COMMON
Known Issues:
Description: Incorrect handling of SNMP bulk requests. Disable the use of bulk requests in the SNMP interface settings. Version: all versions firmware Device: ZYXEL MGS3520-28
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/422668-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-templates-for-zyxel
Template tooling version used: 0.41

trigger.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

item.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Contact
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person.

item.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: CPU utilization
item.description: MIB: ZYXEL-ES-COMMON Show device CPU load in %, it's the snapshot of CPU load when getting the values.

trigger.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: High CPU utilization
trigger.event_name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: High CPU utilization (over {$CPU.UTIL.CRIT}% for 5m)
trigger.description: CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

trigger.expression: last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.fwversion,#1)<>last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.fwversion,#2) and length(last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.fwversion))>0
trigger.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Firmware version has changed. Ack to close

item.name: ZYXEL ES3500-8PD: Uptime (hardware)
item.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The amount of time since this host was last initialized. Note that this is different from sysUpTime in the SNMPv2-MIB [RFC1907] because sysUpTime is the uptime of the network management portion of the system.

item.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Location
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor').

item.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: MAC address
item.description: MIB: IF-MIB The interface's address at the protocol layer immediately `below' the network layer in the protocol stack. For interfaces which do not have such an address (e.g., a serial line), this object should contain an octet string of zero length.

item.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Memory utilization
item.description: MIB: ZYXEL-ES-COMMON Show device memory usage in %.

trigger.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: High memory utilization
trigger.event_name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: High memory utilization (>{$MEMORY.UTIL.MAX}% for 5m)
trigger.description: The system is running out of free memory.

item.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Hardware model name
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software. It is mandatory that this only contain printable ASCII characters.

trigger.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Template does not match hardware
trigger.description: This template is for Zyxel MES3500-24S series, but connected to {ITEM.VALUE}

item.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Host name
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name.

item.name: ZYXEL ES3500-8PD: Uptime (network)
item.description: MIB: RFC1213-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.serialnumber,#1)<>last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.serialnumber,#2) and length(last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.serialnumber))>0
trigger.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Device has been replaced
trigger.event_name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Device has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger.description: Device serial number has changed. Ack to close

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: {#ZYXEL.FAN.DESCRIPTION}
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-HW-MONITOR-MIB Current speed in Revolutions Per Minute (RPM) on the fan.

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: {#ZYXEL.FAN.DESCRIPTION} is in critical state

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Administrative status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The desired state of the interface. The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packets can be passed.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Interface name
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB A textual string containing information about the interface

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Link speed
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth in bits per second

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming broadcast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were addressed to a broadcast address at this sub-layer.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming multicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were addressed to a multicast address at this sub-layer. For a MAC layer protocol, this includes both Group and Functional addresses.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming traffic
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming unicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Incoming utilization
item_prototype.description: Interface utilization percentage

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Link type
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-PORT-MIB The entry shows the linkUp cable type (copper, fiber, xfp or cx4) for the combo ports.

valuemap.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S operational mode port link up type

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Interface description
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-PORT-MIB Descriptive name that identifies this port.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Operational status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The current operational state of the interface. The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packets can be passed.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.net.if.operstatus[{#SNMPINDEX}])=2 and last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.net.if.operstatus[{#SNMPINDEX}],#1)<>last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.net.if.operstatus[{#SNMPINDEX}],#2)
trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Link down
trigger_prototype.description:
This trigger expression works as follows: 1. Can be triggered if operations status is down. 2. {TEMPLATE_NAME:METRIC.diff()}=1) - trigger fires only if operational status was up(1) sometime before. (So, do not fire 'ethernal off' interfaces.)
WARNING: if closed manually - won't fire again on next poll, because of .diff.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing broadcast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were addressed to a broadcast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing multicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were addressed to a multicast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent. For a MAC layer protocol, this includes both Group and Functional addresses.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing traffic
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifOutOctets.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing unicast packages
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of packets that higher-level protocols requested be transmitted, and which were not addressed to a multicast or broadcast address at this sub-layer, including those that were discarded or not sent.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Outgoing utilization
item_prototype.description: Interface utilization percentage

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Port {#SNMPINDEX}: Speed Duplex
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-PORT-MIB Select The speed and the duplex mode of the Ethernet connection on this port. Selecting Auto (auto-negotiation) allows one port to negotiate with a peer port automatically to obtain the connection speed and duplex mode that both ends support. When auto-negotiation is turned on, a port on the Switch negotiates with the peer automatically to determine the connection speed and duplex mode. If the peer port does not support auto-negotiation or turns off this feature, the Switch determines the connection speed by detecting the signal on the cable and using half duplex mode. Thus requiring you to make sure that the settings of the peer port are the same in order to connect.

valuemap.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S operational mode port speed duplex

override.name: Don't create triggers for matching interface

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#ZYXEL.SFP.PORT}: {#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION}
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Transceiver module DDM data ({#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION}).

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#ZYXEL.SFP.PORT}: High {#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION}
trigger_prototype.description: The upper threshold value of the parameter is exceeded

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#ZYXEL.SFP.PORT}: Low {#ZYXEL.SFP.DESCRIPTION}
trigger_prototype.description: The parameter values are less than the lower threshold

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Date code
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Transceiver module vendor's manufacturing date code.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Part number
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Part number provided by transceiver module vendor.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Revision
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Revision level for part number provided by transceiver module vendor.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Serial number
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Serial number provided by transceiver module vendor.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.sfp.serialnumber[{#SNMPINDEX}],#1)<>last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.sfp.serialnumber[{#SNMPINDEX}],#2) and length(last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.sfp.serialnumber[{#SNMPINDEX}]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX} has been replaced
trigger_prototype.event_name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX} has been replaced (new serial number received)
trigger_prototype.description: SFP {#SNMPINDEX} serial number has changed. Ack to close

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Status
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Transceiver module type.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Transceiver
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Transceiver module type names.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Vendor
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-TRANSCEIVER-MIB Transceiver module vendor name.

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Temperature "{#ZYXEL.TEMPDESCRIPTION}"
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-HW-MONITOR-MIB The current temperature measured at this sensor

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Temperature {#ZYXEL.TEMPDESCRIPTION} is in critical state

item_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Nominal "{#ZYXEL.DESCRIPTION}"
item_prototype.description: MIB: ZYXEL-HW-MONITOR-MIB The current voltage reading.

trigger_prototype.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S: Voltage {#ZYXEL.DESCRIPTION} is in critical state

macro.description: The time interval for SNMP agent availability trigger expression.
Triggers will be created only for interfaces whose description contains the value of this macro
Filter of discoverable link types. 0 - Down link 1 - Cooper link 2 - Fiber link 3 - XFP 4 - CX4
Filter to exclude discovered by link types.
Filter to exclude discovered interfaces by name.
Filter of discoverable status. 0 - OK with DDM 1 - OK without DDM 2 - nonoperational
Filter to exclude discovered by status.
Filter by discoverable SFP modules name.
Filter to exclude discovered SFP modules by name.
Receiving data from the SFP module is slow, we do not recommend setting the interval less than 10 minutes.

valuemap.name: ZYXEL MES3500-24S operational mode port link up type
ZYXEL MES3500-24S operational mode port speed duplex

trigger.expression: (last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.hw.uptime)>0 and last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.hw.uptime)<10m) or (last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.hw.uptime)=0 and last(/ZYXEL MES3500-24S by SNMP/zyxel.3500_24s.net.uptime)<10m)
trigger.name: ZYXEL ES3500-8PD: Host has been restarted
